org.chronos.chronodb.internal.impl.engines.chunkdb.migration

Class ChunkDBMigration0_5_7_to_0_6_0

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.chronos.chronodb.internal.impl.engines.chunkdb.migration.ChunkDBMigration0_5_7_to_0_6_0
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChronosMigration<ChunkedChronoDB>

    @Migration(from="0.5.7",
           to="0.6.0")
public class ChunkDBMigration0_5_7_to_0_6_0
extends java.lang.Object
implements ChronosMigration<ChunkedChronoDB>
    This migration solves the problem of "unsafe string handling" for branch names, specifically for ChunkDB.

    In essence, it replaces all instances of the deprecated BranchMetadata class with the newer version BranchMetadata2, and uses the branch name as directory name for existing branches. All new branches will receive a UUID-like directory name.

    This migration also creates the branchMetadata.properties file that was introduced in 0.6.0 and contains the IBranchMetadata object in a property (key-value) format.
